snippet.title: Amazon snaps up digital comics retailer Comixology
snippet.description: Amazon.com's purchase of the digital comic book storefront and reader could portend big changes for the burgeoning digital comics market.

snippet.title: DC Comics signs on with Google Play Books
Caped couture: Dress like a DC Comics superhero
snippet.description: Geek clothier Black Milk is on the verge of launching a new superhero collection, riffing on Catwoman, Wonder Woman, Superman... and Rorschach.

snippet.title: Comics website Comics Alliance to relaunch?
Crave giveaway: All 52 of DC Comics' 3D Villains Month comics
snippet.description: What makes DC Comics' bad guys even badder? Appearing on 3D covers, without the need for pesky glasses. Here's your chance to win the whole set of Villains Month comics. That's a lot of evil.

snippet.title: Google Play Books signs on as DC Comics' latest sidekick
snippet.description: The home of Batman, Superman, and Wonder Woman finds a new world in the multiverse of digital bookstores to invade: Google Play Books.

snippet.title: Disney uses the Force to snatch 'Star Wars' from Dark Horse Comics
snippet.description: Small world: After more than 20 years as the anchor of Dark Horse's empire of franchise comics, guess who'll be publishing "Star Wars" comics in the future?

snippet.title: Finally, Marvel's ready for you to hear its comics (scoop)
snippet.description: Marvel upgrades its subscription app with a long-promised smart soundtrack and DVD-style video commentary, after spending a year laying the foundation for a more multimedia-friendly comics reading experience.

snippet.title: Comics Web site Comics Alliance to relaunch?
snippet.description: The massively popular comics Web site was seemingly shut down by AOL late last month, yet a new post on the site hints at a return.

snippet.title: 3D is evil for September's DC Comics
snippet.description: DC Comics' September covers feature unusual print tech to showcase its biggest villains in 3D -- without the aid of annoying glasses. But just like the best bad guys, these comics come with a controversy.
